name: The True Slime King (Early Access)
description:
This game is in early access. The following is what I'll be working to finish before the full release:

  • Adding Corrupt Mode (new game+) to the game (doubling the Story Mode content with new challenges and puzzles).
  • Listening to community feedback on Story Mode and tweaking the difficulty and level ordering accordingly.
  • Improve user interface.
  • Polishing the Level Editor.
  • Polishing Quick Play Mode.
  • Adding small features here and there. Making things more beautiful
  • Bug fixes.

I'm a one person team, so while I'll be working hard to get these things done, don't expect fast updates.

Additional Info

You can find more information on the website:  http://www.thetrueslimeking.com

Save $5 if you buy the soundtrack and game together.
